Account ID card number is not case-sensitive. If it is a Hong Kong ID card, no need to enter brackets. 
Examples are as follows: 
Hong Kong ID card: G1234567 
Mainland ID card: 12345678901234123X 
Mainland Passport: E12345678

The login password is the password you use to log in to the Star Wealth APP, and it is only used for logging into the Star Wealth APP \n\nThe transaction password is the password you use to handle Fosun International Securities business through the trading account. This password can be used to unlock transactions, submit orders, and perform securities trading-related actions within the Star Wealth APP, and can also be used to log in to other trading platforms of Fosun International Securities

Thank you for choosing Star Wealth. Please read and understand the User Agreement, Privacy Policy, and Third-Party Information Sharing List: 
For information push and security, we will request system permissions for phone device info, log info, MAC address, installed apps info, and Android ID.
We strive to protect your personal information with various security technologies. You can access, correct, delete your personal information, and manage your authorization. We also provide channels for account cancellation and complaints.
If you agree to the above agreements, please click agree and continue to use our products and services.
To better protect your personal rights, please read the User Agreement and Privacy Statement before using Fosun Wealth APP services. Agree and accept all terms before using our services.

Valid On The Same Day: Order validity ends at T-day close, unfilled orders will be canceled. Orders submitted after T-day close are preset for T+1 day and remain valid until T+1 day close. \n\nValid Until Revoked: Order remains valid for %s calendar days until fully filled, canceled, or failed.
Modification of trade direction not supported
If market rise exceeds tracking amount, system will automatically submit a limit order
If market fall exceeds tracking amount, system will automatically submit a limit order
If market rise exceeds tracking ratio, system will automatically submit a limit order
If market fall exceeds tracking ratio, system will automatically submit a limit order
Tracking amount must be greater than 0
Tracking ratio must be greater than 0
Specified spread must be greater than 0
Trigger price must be greater than 0

Order will be submitted when market price fall reaches or exceeds %s
When market price falls to trigger price, system automatically submits a limit order
When market price rises to trigger price, system automatically submits a limit order

Auction order is a buy/sell order without a specified price, matched at the final reference equilibrium price after entering the trading system. Auction orders have priority over auction limit orders and are matched in order of time at the final reference equilibrium price.

1. Morning auction market price trading
Orders must be placed between Beijing time T-day 16:10 and T+1 day 09:22, 09:20~09:22 is a random matching period, no order modification or cancellation after 09:15.

2. Closing auction market price trading
Orders must be placed by Beijing time T-day 16:00, 16:08~16:10 is a random matching period, no order modification or cancellation after 16:06.

Auction limit order is a buy/sell order with a specified price. The specified price is equal to or more competitive than the final reference equilibrium price (i.e., buy orders with a specified price equal to or higher than the final reference equilibrium price, or sell orders with a specified price equal to or lower than the final reference equilibrium price) or can be matched at the final reference equilibrium price depending on whether there are enough matching buy/sell orders on the other side. Auction limit orders are matched in order of price and time at the final reference equilibrium price. Auction limit orders will not be matched at a price worse than the final reference equilibrium price.\n\nAfter the pre-opening session ends, any uncompleted auction limit orders with an input price not deviating by nine times or more from the nominal price will automatically transfer to the continuous trading session and be treated as limit orders in the queue at the input price.

1. Morning auction limit trading
Orders must be placed between Beijing time T-day 16:10 and T+1 day 09:22, 09:20~09:22 is a random matching period, no order modification or cancellation after 09:15.

2. Closing auction limit trading
Orders must be placed by Beijing time T-day 16:00, 16:08~16:10 is a random matching period, no order modification or cancellation after 16:06.
A limit order is an order to buy or sell a stock at a specific price or better.

1. Continuous trading session
Morning session: Beijing time 09:30~12:00
Afternoon session: Beijing time 13:00~16:00

2. Grey market trading
Order period: Beijing time 16:15~18:30
Note: Cash from selling stocks in the grey market cannot be used for transactions other than that stock, and this portion of frozen funds will be released after the stock is listed for trading.

Excluding Saturdays, Sundays, and public holidays.
A limit order is an order to buy or sell a stock at a specific price or better.
Pre-market trading session: Eastern Time 04:00~09:30\nContinuous trading session: Eastern Time 09:30~16:00\nPost-market trading session: Eastern Time 16:00~20:00
A limit order is an order to buy or sell a stock at a specific price or better.

1. Opening call auction
09:15~09:25

2. Continuous auction
09:30~11:32
13:00~14:57

3. Closing call auction
14:57~15:00

Orders beyond 24 levels may not be executed due to rapid market fluctuations, network interruptions, server anomalies, and other force majeure factors. Our system will do its best to ensure the stability and reliability of such orders, and Star Wealth is not responsible for any losses or gains arising from this.

Enhanced limit trading, i.e., normal trading, allows investors to buy or sell stocks at their specified or better price. If the stock does not reach or exceed the limit price, the order will not be executed. Enhanced limit orders can be matched with up to 10 queues simultaneously (can buy or sell at a better price). The selling price cannot be lower than 10 price levels below the best bid price, and cannot be higher than 24 price levels above the best ask price. The buying price cannot be higher than 10 price levels above the best ask price, and cannot be lower than 24 price levels below the best bid price.

1. Continuous trading session
Morning session: Beijing time 09:30~12:00
Afternoon session: Beijing time 13:00~16:00

2. Grey market trading
Order period: Beijing time 16:15~18:30
Note: Cash from selling stocks in the grey market cannot be used for transactions other than that stock, and this portion of frozen funds will be released after the stock is listed for trading.

Excluding Saturdays, Sundays, and public holidays.

Special limit trading can be matched with up to 10 queues simultaneously (i.e., the 10th queue 9 price levels away from the best price queue), as long as the transaction price is not worse than the input price. Special limit trading has no input price restriction. As long as the sell order price is equal to or lower than the best bid price, or the buy order price is equal to or higher than the best ask price. After matching, the trading system will cancel the remaining balance of the original buy/sell order that could not be executed.

1. Continuous trading session
Morning session: Beijing time 09:30~12:00
Afternoon session: Beijing time 13:00~16:00

2. Grey market trading
Order period: Beijing time 16:15~18:30
Note: Cash from selling stocks in the grey market cannot be used for transactions other than that stock, and this portion of frozen funds will be released after the stock is listed for trading.

Excluding Saturdays, Sundays, and public holidays.
A stop loss limit order specifies a stop loss trigger price. Once the market price reaches the specified trigger price, the system will automatically submit a limit order

1. Buy direction: Trigger price must be higher than market price. Sell direction: Trigger price must be lower than market price.\n2. Stop loss limit orders are a special order type developed for investors, and are free to use. Our system will do its best to ensure the stability and reliability of such orders, but may not be executed or executed incorrectly due to network interruptions, server anomalies, and other force majeure factors. Star Wealth is not responsible for any losses or gains arising from this.
A take profit limit order specifies a take profit trigger price. Once the market price reaches the specified trigger price, the system will automatically submit a limit order

1. Buy direction: Trigger price must be lower than market price. Sell direction: Trigger price must be higher than market price.\n2. Take profit limit orders are a special order type developed for investors, and are free to use. Our system will do its best to ensure the stability and reliability of such orders, but may not be executed or executed incorrectly due to network interruptions, server anomalies, and other force majeure factors. Star Wealth is not responsible for any losses or gains arising from this.

A trailing stop loss limit order sets a tracking amount/percentage, and the stop loss price dynamically changes with the real-time market price. Once the market price reaches the stop loss price, the system will automatically submit a limit order.

Trailing stop loss limit orders are a special order type developed for investors, and are free to use. Our system will do its best to ensure the stability and reliability of such orders, but may not be executed or executed incorrectly due to network interruptions, server anomalies, and other force majeure factors. Star Wealth is not responsible for any losses or gains arising from this.

Net Buying/Selling Volume: Estimated based on the stock's current trading day's detailed transactions and broker data

Data for the Last N Days:
Net Buying Volume = Current Trading Day Holding Volume - Holding Volume N Days Ago
Net Selling Volume = Holding Volume N Days Ago - Current Trading Day Holding Volume
(This is estimated data for reference only)
Bar Chart Represents Relative Share Count (10,000 Shares), [ ] Indicates Daily Change
Bar Chart Represents Relative Share Count (1,000 Shares), [ ] Indicates Daily Change
Bar Chart Represents Relative Index Contract Count, [ ] Indicates Daily Change

Please Fill in the Following Personal Information
As currently defined as a professional investor, real-time US stock quotes are no longer provided
Special Purpose Acquisition Company (SPAC) Awareness Assessment

This assessment form is designed to evaluate whether you have general knowledge about Special Purpose Acquisition Companies. We will consider whether you understand the nature and risks of SPACs based on the data you provide.\nA SPAC is a shell company that raises funds through an initial public offering with the aim of merging with an operating company within a predetermined period (usually two years) after listing. SPAC itself has no business operations and, except for: (a) funds raised from the IPO; and (b) funds raised by SPAC sponsors to cover SPAC expenses, has no other assets.
Part One: Conditions and Investment Orientation for Assessing Client's SPAC Awareness

I/We have executed SPAC transactions on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange or other recognized stock markets (i.e., any stock market operated by a recognized exchange company regulated by any jurisdiction outside Hong Kong)
I/We currently or previously have work experience related to SPACs
I/We have received and/or participated in online or classroom training and/or courses provided by academic or financial institutions related to SPACs

The investment amount in SPACs accounts for less than 50% of my/our assets. Furthermore, my/our primary goal is to achieve higher returns from complex or volatile investment products (such as SPACs), and I/we can accept significant price fluctuations
Please Enter the Relevant Stock Market
Please Enter Relevant Training or Course Name
Please Enter the Name of the Organizing Institution
You must meet at least one of the assessment conditions in "Part One" and fill in the relevant information to proceed to "Part Two"
Part Two: SPAC Awareness and Risk Questionnaire
Do you understand that the offering of this security is conducted solely by way of placement and does not involve an offer to the public in Hong Kong?
Do you understand that the offering, issuance, and trading of this security must be limited to professional investors only?

Do you understand that to ensure the offered securities will not be sold to or traded by the public in Hong Kong (without prohibiting sales to or trading by professional investors), the minimum trading unit of Class A shares at the time of listing and thereafter, calculated at the issue price of HKD 10 per Class A share, must not be less than the number of shares constituting a minimum trading unit of HKD 1 million; or as may be specified from time to time by the Stock Exchange in a written notice to the SPAC in response to any proposed corporate action related to the SPAC's capital, which may or is likely to significantly reduce the value of the trading unit of these shares?
A Special Purpose Acquisition Company has no operating or financial history to allow you to evaluate our ability to achieve business objectives based on relevant benchmarks
The past performance of the SPAC's sponsors and their affiliates, management team, directors, and advisory committee members does not reflect their future performance
The SPAC may not be able to announce a SPAC merger transaction within 24 months after the listing date or complete a SPAC merger transaction within 36 months after the listing date
The SPAC may not have sufficient resources to complete a SPAC merger transaction

Since the SPAC has not currently selected any SPAC merger target to seek a SPAC merger transaction with, nor is it limited to evaluating SPAC merger targets within a specific industry, sector, or geographic area, you will not be able to determine the operational advantages or risks of any specific SPAC merger target
*"Professional Investor" means as defined in Part 1 of Schedule 1 to the Securities and Futures Ordinance

I/We confirm that the assessment information provided above is true at the time of provision
I/We undertake to notify Fosun International Securities Limited ("Fosun International Securities") of any changes in the information
I/We understand that if the above assessment content is untrue, Fosun International Securities will not be able to assess the suitability of the requested services for me/us
I/We fully understand the risks of trading SPAC stocks
Your SPAC awareness must meet all the assessment conditions in "Part Two" to submit this signing and continue SPAC operations

1. Daily Fund Usage Quota = Total Daily Quota - Remaining Quota\n\n2. Daily Net Buying = Daily Purchase Amount - Daily Sale Amount

Adjustment to the Northbound Trading Information Disclosure Mechanism of Shanghai-Hong Kong Stock Connect, no longer disclosing the buying and selling turnover of Shanghai and Shenzhen Stock Connect in real-time.

Data display rule adjustment: 
During trading hours: When the daily quota balance of Shanghai and Shenzhen Stock Connect is ≥30%, it shows "Sufficient Quota"; <30%, the daily quota balance available for use is disclosed in real-time.
After trading hours (around 17:30 Beijing time): Update the daily net buying.

Dear customer, before the implementation of the "Hong Kong Investor Identification Code System and Over-the-counter Securities Transaction Reporting System", you need to read the relevant agreements and authorize the transfer of your personal data to the exchange/SFC. If not completed in time, your account can only execute sell and transfer out instructions, and cannot transfer in securities or conduct buy transactions. Please click the button below to complete the signing immediately. If you have any questions, please contact customer service.

Dear customer, the "Hong Kong Investor Identification Code System and Over-the-counter Securities Transaction Reporting System" has been officially implemented. As you have not read the relevant agreements and completed the authorization in time, the current account can only execute sell and transfer out instructions, and cannot execute stock transfer in or buy transactions. Please click the button below to complete the authorization immediately. After completion, the account lock will be lifted on the next working day. If you have any questions, please contact customer service

Today's income is counted from 9:00 AM (Beijing time) every day, including today's profit and loss, transaction fees, interest deductions, etc., and all currency assets are converted into a unified currency for display at the real-time exchange rate.\nTherefore, today's income is not equal to the total profit and loss of the day, click to learn more.

This shows the latest earnings of Star Wealth, public funds, and private funds held in the current financial account, updated daily. The latest earnings of private funds may not be updated in time.\nLatest earnings = T-day unit net value - T-1 day unit net value

Virtual Asset ETF Physical Subscription refers to investors using their held virtual assets, such as Bitcoin or Ethereum, to directly purchase ETF shares instead of cash transactions.

The compliant fiat/stablecoin exchange service allows users to exchange fiat and stablecoins through a regulated virtual asset exchange. Currently supports USD/HKD and USDT/USDT-TRC20/USDC exchange services, requiring completion of compliant investor certification.

This presents the probability of the stock rising/falling today and the target price the stock can reach today. In simple terms, it is an estimate of the likelihood of the stock price rising or falling today based on AI capabilities.
Rise/Fall: This is a probability prediction generated based on AI large model capabilities, intuitively showing you the likelihood of the stock price rising or falling.
Target Price: Also based on AI large model capabilities, it provides a probability prediction to estimate the target price the stock may reach.

Important Note\nThis prediction is generated by an AI language model and is for reference only. The stock market is affected by various uncontrollable and complex factors, and the AI output may have errors or inaccuracies. Do not rely solely on this prediction for investment decisions. It is recommended to combine your own judgment and other information sources, carefully assess risks, and comprehensively judge whether it meets your actual operational needs.
